0.name: Default Appearance
0.desc:
When no portrait frame is set
<color=#92fc63>and when an oathed ship is set as secretary ship, the oath portrait frame is displayable.</color>

300.name: Leader
300.desc:
<color=#ffffff>Can be unlocked by collecting points from Returnee Missions. </color>
(Lasts for 30 days)

301.name: Returnee
301.desc:
<color=#ffffff>Welcome back to the Admiralty, Commander. We expect great things from you.</color>
(Lasts for 30 days)

302.name: The Iron Blood Oath
302.desc:
<color=#ffffff>"Red blood and cold iron temper our indomitable will."</color>
Obtained from the "Scherzo of Iron and Blood" event.

303.name: Wings of Freedom
303.desc:
<color=#ffffff>"For our azure freedom! God bless the Eagle Union!"</color>
Obtained from the "Ashen Simulacrum" event.

304.name: Insignia of Glory
304.desc:
<color=#ffffff>"Display the glory and dignity of the Sardegna Empire to the whole world!"</color>
Obtained from the "Empyreal Tragicomedy" event.

305.name: Sakura Ceremony
305.desc:
<color=#ffffff>"With this offering, we pray for a bright future for the Sakura Empire."</color>
Obtained from the "Swirling Cherry Blossoms" event.

306.name: Proof of Solidarity
306.desc:
<color=#ffffff>"Unite, comrades! The world is ours to change!"</color>
Obtained from the "Northern Overture" event.

307.name: Wings of Lightning
307.desc:
<color=#ffffff>"O, fearless thunderbolts of liberty! Guide us through the darkness!"</color> 
Obtained from the "Microlayer Medley" event.

308.name: Iris Canto
308.desc:
<color=#ffffff>"May numerous hymns cross the seas to reach the skies... Vive la Iris!"</color>
Obtained from the "Skybound Oratorio" event.

309.name: Royal Crown
309.desc:
<color=#ffffff>"For the glory of Her Majesty and the Royal Navy!"</color>
Obtained from the "Aurora Noctis" event.

310.name: Laffey's Gift
310.desc:
<color=#ffffff>A special portrait frame designed with Laffey's motifs.</color>
Obtained from the 2nd Anniversary event.

311.name: Illusory Butterfly
311.desc:
<color=#ffffff>"May the light of hope shine forevermore, whether in reality or in a dream."</color>
Obtained from "Dreamwaker's Butterfly" event.

312.name: Weapon of the Iron Blood
312.desc:
<color=#ffffff>"May my red blood flow into the frigid mold of war."</color>
Obtained from the "Inverted Orthant" event.

313.name: Seal of Dawn's Rime
313.desc:
<color=#ffffff>"The Sirens' secrets shall dance in the palm of our hand!"</color> 
Obtained from the "Khorovod of Dawn's Rime" event.

314.name: Pride of Sardegna
314.desc:
<color=#ffffff>"Come, and become a pillar for our reborn empire! Let us seize glory together! "</color> 
Obtained from the "Daedalian Hymn" event.

315.name: Voltaic Lightwings
315.desc: <color=#ffffff>The indomitable Black Dragon of the Eagle Union has arrived! Together, let us shake the foundations of this world!</color>  Obtained from the "Mirror involution" event.

101.name: 1st Anniversary
101.desc:
<color=#ffffff>Happy 1st Anniversary!</color>
Unlocked by using the New Dawn item.

201.name: Achievement Chat Bubbles
201.desc:
<color=#ffffff>Clear Challenge Mode for the first time to obtain.</color>
(19.08.07-19.09.29)

102.name: 2nd Anniversary
102.desc:
Granted to all Commanders who have defended the port for two years.
 (earned by participating in the 2nd Anniversary limited event)

203.name: Achievement Chat Bubbles
203.desc:
<color=#ffffff>Clear Challenge Mode for the first time to obtain.</color>
（19.12.19-20.03.29）

103.name: 1000 Days Commemoration
103.desc:
<color=#ffffff>May our next thousand days together be just as memorable!</color>
A special chat frame awarded for Azur Lane's 1,000-day launch celebration.

205.name: Achievement Chat Bubbles
205.desc:
<color=#ffffff>Clear Challenge Mode for the first time to obtain.</color>
（20.07.09-20.10.04）

104.name: 3rd Anniversary
104.desc:
Granted to all Commanders who have defended the port for three years.
 (earned by participating in the 3rd Anniversary limited event)

501.name: Manjuu Pizzeria Frame
501.desc:
<color=#ffffff>Let your love for delicious pizza be known by all!</color>
―Obtained in the "Manjuu Pizzeria" event.

207.name: Achievement Chat Bubbles
207.desc:
<color=#ffffff>Clear Challenge Mode for the first time to obtain.</color>
（21.01.21-21.04.21）

204.desc:
<color=#ffffff>Clear Challenge Mode for the first time to obtain.</color>
（20.04.09-20.07.05）

106.name: Gunslinger's Glory
106.desc: Buckle up, Buckaroo! There's a new sheriff in town!
